title: Antioch, California
summary: Antioch is the second-largest city in Contra Costa County, California, United States. Located in the East Bay region of the San Francisco Bay Area along the San Joaquinâ€“Sacramento River Delta. The city's population was 102,372 at the 2010 census[11] and estimated to be 111,502 in 2019.[12] Formerly an all-white sundown town,[13] the city has grown substantially more diverse since the 1990s.[14][15]
